messages.message: by the default Reader configs, we make an API call to https://instabaseinternalocr.cognitiveservices.azure.com/vision/v3.2/read/analyze to do OCR

Thank you!

For future reference, Converse app's  OCR is no longer working because we have restrictions with the Google Cloud OCR API.

I updated
`/home/owner/instabase/shared-utils/build-utils/shared/env-local.json`

changed `default_ocr_provider` from `gott` to `msft`.
